steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl
Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl
Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl
Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl
Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Mix with hands to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl
Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl
Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Use hands to mix batter until no lumps remain

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Disbalanced the microwave plate. Fix it. Then, microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue. Burn the cake

steps.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
remove-then carefully remove the paper liner
Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag
seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake
steps.modified_description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake. Put the frosting all over.

errors.description: Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl
